verses.text: And the LORD spoke to Moses, saying,
Speak to the children of Israel, and say to them, I \add am\add* the LORD your God.
After the doings of the land of Egypt in which ye dwelt, shall ye not do: and after the doings of the land of Canaan whither I bring you, shall ye not do: neither shall ye walk in their ordinances.
Ye shall perform my judgments, and keep my ordinances, to walk in them; I \add am\add* the LORD your God.
Ye shall therefore keep my statutes and my judgments: which if a man doeth, he shall live in them: I \add am\add* the LORD.
None of you shall approach to any that is near of kin to him, to uncover \add their\add* nakedness: I am the LORD.
The nakedness of thy father, or the nakedness of thy mother, shalt thou not uncover: she \add is\add* thy mother, thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
The nakedness of thy father's wife shalt thou not uncover: it \add is\add* thy father's nakedness.
The nakedness of thy sister, the daughter of thy father, or daughter of thy mother, \add whether\add* born at home, or born abroad, \add even\add* their nakedness thou shalt not uncover.
The nakedness of thy son's daughter, or of thy daughter's daughter, \add even\add* their nakedness thou shalt not uncover: for theirs \add is\add* thy own nakedness.
The nakedness of thy father's wife's daughter, begotten by thy father, (she \add is\add* thy sister) thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's sister: she \add is\add* thy father's near kinswoman.
Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy mother's sister: for she \add is\add* thy mother's near kinswoman.
Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy father's brother, thou shalt not approach to his wife: she \add is\add* thy aunt.
Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy daughter-in-law: she \add is\add* thy son's wife, thou shalt not uncover her nakedness.
Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of thy brother's wife: it \add is\add* thy brother's nakedness.

Thou shalt not uncover the nakedness of a woman and her daughter, neither shalt thou take her son's daughter, or her daughter's daughter, to uncover her nakedness; \add for\add* they \add are\add* her near kinswomen: it \add is\add* wickedness.
Neither shalt thou take a wife to her sister, to vex \add her\add* , to uncover her nakedness besides the other in her life -\add time\add* .
Also thou shalt not approach to a woman to uncover her nakedness, as long as she is put apart for her uncleanness.
Moreover, thou shalt not lie carnally with thy neighbor's wife, to defile thyself with her.
And thou shalt not let any of thy seed pass through \add the fire\add* to Molech, neither shalt thou profane the name of thy God: I \add am\add* the LORD.
Thou shalt not lie with mankind, as with womankind: it \add is\add* abomination.
Neither shalt thou lie with any beast to defile thyself therewith: neither shall any woman stand before a beast to lie down thereto: it \add is\add* confusion.
Defile not ye yourselves in any of these things; for in all these the nations are defiled which I cast out before you:
And the land is defiled: therefore I do visit its iniquity upon it, and the land itself vomiteth out her inhabitants.
Ye shall therefore keep my statutes and my judgments, and shall not commit \add any\add* of these abominations; \add neither\add* any of your own nation, nor any stranger that sojourneth among you.
(For all these abominations have the men of the land done, who \add were\add* before you, and the land is defiled;)
That the land may not vomit you out also, when ye defile it, as it vomited out the nations that \add were\add* before you.
For whoever shall commit any of these abominations, even the souls that commit \add them\add* shall be cut off from among their people.

Therefore shall ye keep my ordinance, that \add ye\add* commit not \add any one\add* of these abominable customs, which were committed before you, and that ye defile not yourselves in them; I \add am\add* the LORD your God.
